meanings.def: the position of somebody/something on a scale that shows how good or important they are in relation to other similar people or things, especially in sport
examples: He has improved his ranking this season from 67th to 30th.
She has retained her No.1 world ranking.
The product has consistently been given a high ranking by consumer groups.

meanings.def: an official list showing the best players of a particular sport in order of how successful they are
examples: He is currently 16th in the world rankings.

meanings.def: having a high or the highest rank in an organization, etc.
examples: He was the ranking officer (= the most senior officer present at a particular time).
